page.title: 05SERVICES IN GORDON
page.content: In Gordon we have two garages. The largest one is Hunters and the smaller one is Bob Waldies. Hunters sells cars and also has its own breakdown service. If you have smashed your car you can get them to collect and mend it. A travelling library comes once a week to Gordon. anyone in the village can get books from it as long as they return them. We have no doctors or ambulance service,but ten minutes drive in Earlston there is a health service. It was only built in the middle of 1984. The police station we use is also in Earlston. Kelso supplies us with fire engines and ambulances as Earlston does not have them.
